lines: You and ${spouseName} are both very tired. Before you both turn in ${spouseName} complains that her feet have been bothering her, and that she would appreciate it if you would give her a nice, soothing foot massage. It would take a great effort to give
her a massage, since you are so tired.
#TELL HER YOU WILL GIVE HER ONE IF SHE GIVES YOU ONE FIRST
#TELL HER THAT YOU ARE TOO TIRED

Her feet are calloused and bony, the skin on top loose. As you massage ${spouseName}'s feet your fatigue seems to fade, because you realize how much pleasure and relief the massage is giving your wife. It is an intimate moment for both of
you; and she appreciates the special care she is receiving. As you talk, you notice that her voice is beginning to drift off. She falls soundly asleep.

"No deal, you selfish bum!" A massage is not the type of thing to make deals over. No recipient of a good massage is likely to want to give one in return. You should know that by now. ${spouseName} falls asleep and has a restless night.
${spouseName} thinks you are being selfish (you really are), but by now she knows what to expect from you and keeps reminding herself of the phrase "for better or worse...."
